mapper.select: SELECT c.cart_count, c.cart_code, p.product_code, p.product_name, p.delivery_cost, p.sale_price, p.product_cost, g.upload_name, g.upload_path, o.option_detail_code, o.option_last, o.option_price FROM ar_cart c JOIN ar_option_detail o ON c.option_detail_code = o.option_detail_code JOIN ar_products p ON o.product_code = p.product_code JOIN ar_imgs g ON g.product_code = p.product_code JOIN ar_member m ON m.member_id = c.member_id where c.member_id = #{memberId} AND g.img_order =0
mapper.delete: DELETE ar_cart where member_id = #{memberId} AND cart_code = #{cartCode}
mapper.insert:
SELECT NVL(MAX(cart_code),0)+1 FROM ar_cart
insert into ar_cart ( cart_code, member_id, option_detail_code, cart_count ) values( #{cartCode}, #{memberId}, #{optionDetailCode}, #{cartCount} )
